name: Christmas Party Costume Salon - XMas Santa Girl Dress Up for Winter Holidays
name_original: Christmas Party Costume Salon - XMas Santa Girl Dress Up for Winter Holidays
description:
Hurray! Its winter season and Christmas is here! This holiday season you will get to enjoy cool make and dressup in this girls game, Christmas Salon. Be the Santa girl you always wanted to be. Enjoy the festival makeup and makeover at Christmas Salon. Sing happy sings while you dress up in gorgeous outfits. Who wants to look fabulous?

So what are you waiting for? Download this game app and play like a Santa Girl.
